name: EasyPost
headline: The shipping infrastructure of the internet.
description:
EasyPost is the missing API that makes it quick and painless to integrate shipping into your application.

Some of the biggest names in retail rely on EasyPost to ship faster, smarter and cheaper. We manage the headaches involved with dated carrier technology so our customers can focus on what makes their business great. Integrate once with EasyPost and seamlessly add carriers, generate shipping labels, track packages in near real-time and insure your shipments.

EasyPost is growing fast! Check out our jobs page and join the excitement: https://www.easypost.com/jobs
generated_description:
**EasyPost Summary**

EasyPost is a San Francisco-based company that aims to simplify the often comically complex world of shipping logistics. Their mission? To create "the shipping infrastructure of the internet." Founded in the Y Combinator Batch S13, EasyPost started as a seamless API solution that enables developers to easily integrate shipping functionalities into their applications. This means businesses can stop wrestling with outdated technology and focus on scaling and enhancing their core activities.

With just one integration, users can access a plethora of carriers, generate shipping labels, track packages in real time, and even insure their shipments. Some of the biggest names in retail, including Walmart, eBay, and Starbucks, rely on EasyPost to ship their products smarter, faster, and cheaper. 

As of now, EasyPost employs a team of 51 dedicated individuals and is actively growing. They provide an array of services, including discounted shipping rates, return shipping options, and various APIs like tracking, address verification, and shipping insurance—all designed to streamline operations for businesses of all sizes, from small shops to massive enterprises.

For those intrigued by the fast-paced world of logistics, EasyPost offers various job opportunities. You can explore careers at EasyPost [here](https://www.easypost.com/jobs).

In sum, if you’re looking for a reliable, efficient way to manage shipping logistics and save money while doing so, EasyPost stands ready to be your partner. By leveraging their technology, users can expect better rates, real-time insights, and a significant reduction in logistical headaches. Dive in and explore what they have to offer—shipping has never been easier!

For more information, visit their website at [easypost.com](http://easypost.com).
